text: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ

translation.en: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown
translation.id: (Ingatlah) ketika mereka masuk ke tempatnya lalu mengucapkan, "Salāman (salam)", Ibrahim menjawab, "Salāmun (salam)". (Mereka itu) orang-orang yang belum dikenalnya
